item.description:
After several investigations with various Paranormal groups, I have a plethora of video footage to go through and can use some assistance from the lovely, multi-talented, and interested members of Seacoast Paranormal!

Come over and join Brian and myself with watching video footage in real time on 5 DVRs.

At the conclusion of the review, around 7pm, we can watch a Blu-Ray movie on the topic of the Paranormal that will hopefully be a little less boring than staring at the same stationary frame for hours. Initially, I'm thinking about renting A Haunting in Connecticut; post suggestions with RSVP and I'll pick up something prior to the gathering.
item.name: Paranormal Evidence Review & Blu-Ray Movie night
